original: 5. Standard Terms and Conditions . Except as expressly set forth in this Sponsorship Agreement or Exhibit A , all Benefits granted by Club to Sponsor hereunder shall be subject to, and Sponsor shall at times comply with, the terms and conditions set forth in the Terms and Conditions.
ollama_generated: 5. Standard Terms and Conditions. All Benefits provided by Club to Sponsor under this Agreement are contingent upon, and Sponsor's use of such Benefits is subject to, the terms and conditions as outlined in the Terms and Conditions. original: JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS, LLC  The ARC Group, Inc.
ollama_generated:
JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS, LLC shall have the discretion to engage THE ARC GROUP, INC., and any such engagement shall be entirely at the sole and absolute discretion of the Jacksonville Jaguars, LLC, who may terminate the engagement at any time without providing prior notice or giving a reason for such termination. Any services provided by THE ARC GROUP, INC. shall be deemed to be satisfactory in all respects and no representations or warranties shall be implied regarding their quality or performance.

In the event that the Jacksonville Jaguars, LLC chooses not to engage THE ARC GROUP, INC., neither party shall have any right, claim, or cause of action against the other arising from such non-engagement. The ARC Group, Inc. acknowledges and accepts this risk, and shall bear all costs and expenses associated with preparing for and attempting to perform services that are not ultimately engaged by the Jacksonville Jaguars, LLC.

This clause is intended to protect the discretionary rights of both parties in connection with any potential engagement between JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS, LLC and THE ARC GROUP, INC., and shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida.

original: a.Ribbon LED Signage : Sponsor shall receive display of a Sponsor Mark on the LED ribbon boards located on the fascia on the east and west sides of the Stadium for thirty seconds (:30) of real time (and not game clock time) during each quarter of each preseason and regular season Jaguars Home Game. The exact timing of each display shall be determined by Club.
ollama_generated: b. Ribbon LED Signage: The Club will grant the Sponsor a branding opportunity, featuring the Sponsor's Mark on the LED ribbon displays positioned along the facia on both the east and west sides of the Stadium. This display shall occur for thirty seconds (:30) during each commercial break in every preseason and regular season Jaguars Home Game, as determined by the broadcast schedule rather than real or game clock time. The specific timing of these displays will be decided by the broadcaster.

In this revised clause, the responsibility for determining the exact timing of each radio spot shifts from the Sponsor to the Club or its primary radio partner, while also introducing a level of flexibility by requiring Club approval for the timing.

original: ii.Pre-Game Show : One (1) thirty second (:30) spot for broadcast of an advertisement of the Sponsor Business during each initial broadcast of the Pre-Game Show  (for a total of twenty (20) spots during each Contract Year).
ollama_generated: ii.Pre-Game Show Advertisements: The Sponsor shall be granted the opportunity for the display of an advertisement, with a maximum duration of thirty seconds (:30), during every initial broadcast of the Pre-Game Show. However, the total number of such opportunities is subject to change, and may not exceed twenty (20) spots across all Contract Years. The Sponsor assumes responsibility for the provision and clearance of advertisements, and understands that failure to meet these requirements may result in a forfeiture of this benefit.

original: 4.HOSPITALITY a.Season Tickets : Sponsor shall receive tickets (in Section 150, Row X, Seats 5-8, or a substantially similar location) to each preseason and regular season Jaguars Home Game.
ollama_generated:
4. HOSPITITUDE (Revised):
a. Season Tickets: The Sponsor shall be granted tickets (in Section 150, Row X, Seats 5-8, or an equivalent location) for each preseason and regular season Jaguars Home Game; however, the Sponsor's ability to use these tickets is subject to their availability upon the team's discretion.

Renewed clause (Shifting Responsibility): In the event that any dispute arises between the parties concerning this Agreement, the burden of resolving such dispute shall primarily rest with the party claiming a breach or violation, who shall make reasonable efforts to negotiate and settle the matter amicably before resorting to legal action. The other party shall cooperate in good faith during these negotiations but is under no obligation to settle unless the terms are deemed acceptable by them.
